info.title: Model
info.description: Model is a service for managing software models using diagram as code.

put.description: Create or update a component in the model
Create or update a container in the model
Create or update a person in the model

delete.description: Delete an existing person from the model

example.Error: Ab expedita nostrum deleniti minima provident.

Element.description: Path to element consisting of <software system name>[/<container name>[/<component name>]]

ElementView.description: ElementView defines an element in a view

fault.description: Is the error a server-side fault?

id.description: ID is a unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem.

message.description: Message is a human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

name.description: Name is the name of this class of errors.

Dir.description: Path to directory containing a model package

FileLocator.description: FileLocator is the location of a DSL file in a model package

Dir.description: Path to directory containing a model package

Destination.description: Path to destination element, see SourcePath for details.

Source.description: Path to source element consisting of <software system name>[/<container name>[/<component name>]]

RelationshipView.description: RelationshipView defines a relationship in a view

Dir.description: Path to directory containing a model package

Border.description: Type of border to apply to elements

Description.description: Indicates whether the element description should be visible on the resulting diagram

Metadata.description: Indicates whether the element metadata should be visible on the resulting diagram

Opacity.description: Opacity of element as a percentage

Tag.description: Tag of elements to apply style onto

Properties.description: Set of arbitrary name-value properties (shown in diagram tooltips)

items.example: Modi perferendis ipsam id veritatis occaecati.

ContainerBoundaryVisible.description: Indicates whether the container boundaries are visible on the resulting diagram

ContainerName.description: Name of container to create view for

SoftwareSystemName.description: Name of software system to create view for

Properties.description: Set of arbitrary name-value properties (shown in diagram tooltips)

SoftwareSystemName.description: Name of software system to create view for

SystemBoundariesVisible.description: Indicates whether the system boundaries are visible on the resulting diagram

EnterpriseBoundaryVisible.description: Indicates whether the enterprise boundary is visible on the resulting diagram

DestinationPath.description: Relative path to destination element, see SourcePath for details.

InteractionStyle.description: Indicates whether the relationship is synchronous or asynchronous

SourcePath.description: Path to source element consisting of <software system name>[/<container name>[/<component name>]]

Dashed.description: Indicates whether the relationship is dashed

FontSize.description: Font size of label on relationship

Opacity.description: Opacity of relationship as a percentage

Position.description: Position of label on relationship as a percentage (0 is next to source, 100 next to destination)

Tag.description: Tag of relationships to apply style onto

EnterpriseBoundaryVisible.description: Indicates whether the enterprise boundary is visible on the resulting diagram

SoftwareSystemName.description: Name of software system to create view for

Location.description: Indicates whether the system is in-house (Internal) or hosted by a third party (External)

Properties.description: Set of arbitrary name-value properties (shown in diagram tooltips)
